-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | OpenGL UI for the SoccerFun framework
--   
--   This provides an 2D user interface for the SoccerFun framework
--   implemented in OpenGL/GLUT.
@package SoccerFunGL
@version 0.4.1


-- | Usage: Hit <i>q</i> to abort the match
module SoccerFun.UI.GL
gameLength :: TimeUnit
initialise :: IO (String, [String])
runMatch :: (Home -> Field -> Team) -> (Home -> Field -> Team) -> IO ()
playTape :: Tape -> IO ()
registerCallbacks :: Window -> IORef GLdouble -> IORef [Step] -> IO ()
colorRGB :: (GLfloat, GLfloat, GLfloat) -> IO ()
drawAt3D :: Position3D -> IO () -> IO ()
drawAt :: Position -> IO () -> IO ()
square :: IO ()
vector2 :: (Float, Float) -> Vector3 GLfloat
vertex2 :: (Float, Float) -> IO ()
convertDouble :: Double -> GLdouble
convertFloat :: Float -> GLfloat
